00026 YardConfig::YardConfig(wxWindow* parent, wxWindowID id, const wxString& title,
00027                const wxPoint& pos, const wxSize& size, long style)
00028 
00029 :wxDialog(parent, id, title, pos, size, style)
00030 {        
00031     m_construct = true;
00032     wxXmlResource::Get()->Load("res/config.xrc");
00033     wxPanel * panel = wxXmlResource::Get()->LoadPanel(this, "Config");
00034     wxSizer * sizer = panel->GetSizer();
00035     sizer->SetSizeHints(this);
00036     SetSize(sizer->GetMinSize());
00037     
00038     Centre();
00039     
00040     wxConfigBase *pConfig = wxConfigBase::Get();
00041     if (!pConfig)
00042     {
00043         wxLogError(wxT("No Config pointer"));
00044         Destroy(); 
00045         return;
00046     }
00047     
00048     if (!pConfig->HasGroup(wxT("DB")))
00049     {/*
00050         wxLogDebug(wxT("No DB group in config."));
00051         int answer = wxMessageBox("No configuration exists on this computer,"
00052             " would you like to create one?", "Create Config",
00053                             wxYES_NO, this);
00054         if (answer == wxNO)
00055         {
00056             wxLogDebug(wxT("Answer was no."));
00057             //pConfig->DeleteAll();
00058             Destroy();
00059             return;
00060         }*/
00061 #ifdef __WXDEBUG__
00062         pConfig->Write(wxT("/DB/User"), wxT(""));
00063         pConfig->Write(wxT("/DB/Pass"), wxT(""));
00064 #endif
00065         //All we have is 
00066         pConfig->Write(wxT("/DB/Type"), (long) ODBC_MYSQL);
00067         pConfig->Write(wxT("/DB/Driver"), wxT(""));
00068         pConfig->Write(wxT("/DB/DSN"), wxT(""));
00069         pConfig->Write(wxT("/DB/Server"), wxT(""));
00070         pConfig->Write(wxT("/DB/Port"), (long)0);
00071         pConfig->Write(wxT("/HW/PrinterPort"), wxT(""));
00072     }
00073     
00074     wxButton * save = static_cast<wxButton *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CONFIG_SAVE")));
00075     wxTextCtrl * user = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CONFIG_DB_USER")));
00076     wxTextCtrl * pass = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CONFIG_DB_PWORD")));
00077     wxRadioBox * type = static_cast<wxRadioBox *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CONFIG_DB_TYPE")));
00078     wxTextCtrl * driver = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CONFIG_DB_DRIVER")));
00079     wxTextCtrl * dsn = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CONFIG_DB_DSN")));
00080     wxTextCtrl * server = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CONFIG_DB_SERVER")));
00081     wxSpinCtrl * port = static_cast<wxSpinCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CONFIG_DB_PORT")));
00082     wxTextCtrl * printerport = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CONFIG_PRINTER_PORT")));
00083     
00084 
00085 #ifdef __WXDEBUG__    
00086     user->SetValue(pConfig->Read(wxT("/DB/User"), wxString()));
00087     pass->SetValue(pConfig->Read(wxT("/DB/Pass"), wxString()));
00088 #else
00091     user->Disable();
00092     pass->Disable();
00093 #endif
00094     type->SetSelection(pConfig->Read(wxT("/DB/Type"), 0l));
00095     driver->SetValue(pConfig->Read(wxT("/DB/Driver"), wxString()));
00096     dsn->SetValue(pConfig->Read(wxT("/DB/DSN"), wxString()));
00097     server->SetValue(pConfig->Read(wxT("/DB/Server"), wxString()));
00098     wxLogDebug(wxT("Port is: %d"), (int)pConfig->Read(wxT("/DB/Port"), 0l));
00099     port->SetValue((int)pConfig->Read(wxT("/DB/Port"), 0l));
00100     printerport->SetValue(pConfig->Read(wxT("/HW/PrinterPort"), wxString()));
00101      
00102     wxButton * cancel = (wxButton *)FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CONFIG_CANCEL"));
00103     cancel->SetLabel("Close");
00104         
00105     save->Disable();
00106     m_saved = true;
00107     
00108     Show();
00109     m_construct = false;
00110 }

00115 wxString YardConfig::GetDSN()
00116 {
00117     wxConfigBase *pConfig = wxConfigBase::Get();
00118     if (!pConfig)
00119     {
00120         wxLogDebug(wxT("No Config pointer"));
00121         return wxString();
00122     }
00123     
00124     if (!pConfig->HasGroup(wxT("DB")))
00125     {
00126         wxLogDebug(wxT("No DB group"));
00127         return wxString();
00128         
00129     }        
00130             
00131     return pConfig->Read(wxT("/DB/DSN"), wxString());
00132 }
00133 
00134 wxString YardConfig::GetPrinterPort()
00135 {
00136      wxConfigBase *pConfig = wxConfigBase::Get();
00137     if (!pConfig)
00138     {
00139         wxLogDebug(wxT("No Config pointer"));
00140         return wxString();
00141     }
00142     
00143     if (!pConfig->HasGroup(wxT("DB")))
00144     {
00145         wxLogDebug(wxT("No DB group"));
00146         return wxString();
00147         
00148     }        
00149             
00150     return pConfig->Read(wxT("/HW/PrinterPort"), wxString());
00151     
00152 }

00154 void YardConfig::OnBrowse(wxCommandEvent& event) {
00155  
00156     wxString driver = wxFileSelector(wxT("Select your ODBC driver"), "",
00157         wxT(""), wxT(""), wxT("*.*"), 0, this);

00166 void YardConfig::OnSave(wxCommandEvent& event)
00167 {
00168     wxLogDebug(wxT("OnSave"));
00169     
00170     wxConfigBase *pConfig = wxConfigBase::Get();
00171     if (!pConfig)
00172     {
00173         wxLogError(wxT("OnSave::No Config pointer"));
00174         return;
00175     }
00176 
00177     wxLogDebug(wxT("Saving DB"));
00178 #ifdef __WXDEBUG__ // only using these fields in debug mode
00179     wxTextCtrl * user = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CONFIG_DB_USER")));
00180     wxTextCtrl * pass = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CONFIG_DB_PWORD")));
00181 #endif
00182     wxRadioBox * type = static_cast<wxRadioBox *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CONFIG_DB_TYPE")));
00183     wxTextCtrl * driver = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CONFIG_DB_DRIVER")));
00184     wxTextCtrl * dsn = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CONFIG_DB_DSN")));
00185     wxTextCtrl * server = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CONFIG_DB_SERVER")));
00186     wxSpinCtrl * port = static_cast<wxSpinCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CONFIG_DB_PORT")));
00187     wxTextCtrl * printerport = static_cast<wxTextCtrl *>(FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CONFIG_PRINTER_PORT")));
00188   
00189 #ifdef __WXDEBUG__
00190     pConfig->Write(wxT("/DB/User"), user->GetValue());
00191     pConfig->Write(wxT("/DB/Pass"), pass->GetValue());
00192 #endif
00193     //All we have is 
00194     pConfig->Write(wxT("/DB/Type"), (long) type->GetSelection());
00195     pConfig->Write(wxT("/DB/Driver"), driver->GetValue());
00196     pConfig->Write(wxT("/DB/DSN"), dsn->GetValue());
00197     pConfig->Write(wxT("/DB/Server"), server->GetValue());
00198     pConfig->Write(wxT("/DB/Port"), (long) port->GetValue());
00199     pConfig->Write(wxT("/HW/PrinterPort"), printerport->GetValue());
00200 
00201         
00202     wxButton * save = (wxButton *)FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CONFIG_SAVE"));
00203     wxButton * cancel = (wxButton *)FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CONFIG_CANCEL"));
00204     cancel->SetLabel("Close");
00205     
00206     save->Disable();
00207     m_saved = true;
00208 }

00212 }

00214 
00215 void YardConfig::OnChange(wxCommandEvent& event)
00216 {
00217     if (m_construct)
00218         return;
00219     
00220     if (m_saved)
00221     {
00222         wxLogDebug(wxT("Something changed"));
00223             
00224         wxButton * save = (wxButton *)FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CONFIG_SAVE"));
00225         wxButton * cancel = (wxButton *)FindWindow(XRCID("ID_CONFIG_CANCEL"));
00226         cancel->SetLabel("Cancel");
00227     
00228         save->Enable();
00229         m_saved = false;
00230     }
00231     
00232 }
00233 
00234 void YardConfig::OnDeleteConfig(wxCommandEvent& event)
00235 {
00236     wxConfigBase *pConfig = wxConfigBase::Get();
00237     if ( pConfig == NULL )
00238     {
00239         wxLogError(_T("No config to delete!"));
00240         return;
00241     }
00242 
00243     if ( pConfig->DeleteAll() )
00244     {
00245         wxLogMessage(_T("Config file/registry key successfully deleted."));
00246 
00247         //delete wxConfigBase::Set(NULL);
00248         //wxConfigBase::DontCreateOnDemand();
00249     }
00250     else
00251     {
00252         wxLogError(_T("Deleting config file/registry key failed."));
00253     }
00254     
00255 }
